```{r setup, include = FALSE}
needed_packages <- c("dplyr", "forcats", "ggplot2", "purrr", "readr", "stringr",
  "tibble", "tidyr")
load_packages <- function(x) {
  if (!(x %in% rownames(installed.packages()))) {
    install.packages(x)
  }
  suppressPackageStartupMessages(require(x, character.only = TRUE))
}
vapply(needed_packages, load_packages, logical(1))

options(knitr.kable.NA = '')
```

# Welcome {-}

<a href="https://github.com/wjakethompson/cosmodown"><img src="figures/cosmodown-large.png" width="181" height="210" align="right" alt="cosmodown logo" /></a>

This is the website for the **cosmodown** R package [@R-cosmodown]. The website is meant to provide documentation and example usage for creating a thesis or dissertation using the University of Kansas formatting. In addition to the website, this document is  also rendered as a PDF using the University of Kansas $\LaTeX$ template. The PDF can be downloaded from the top of this page to see what the rendered PDF document looks like with the correct formatting.
